segments.text: I can't help but observe the woman at the sink again.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's still meticulously drying that plate, completely absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her concentration is absolute, almost admirable in its intensity.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't glance left or right, her focus unyielding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost unbelievable that she's unaware of the growing puddle beneath her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children, meanwhile, are like little ninjas, working in perfect sync.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They’re so stealthy in their cookie operation, right behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a slight disgust at their sneakiness, though I understand the allure of cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They know she's preoccupied, and they're taking full advantage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me wonder what else they get away with.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised by how well they’ve managed to orchestrate this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a scene of domestic subterfuge.
segments.speaker: PAR
